While this crown is not fashioned out of the noblest of materials, the craftsmanship is excellent. It is decorated with filigree in geometrical patterns, enhanced with pieces of silver.
This silver crown is decorated with engravings depicting the [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s and decorated with fine pieces of amber.
This golden masterpiece is decorated with filigree leaves and vines. A dozen gleaming crows with amber eyes are perched along the top, their wings spread out as if they are about to take flight.
The hooped crown is made from gold and decorated with foreign precious stones – emeralds, rubies, sapphires and diamonds – the finest ones the size of quails eggs.

Long ago, a great conclave of mage-smiths convened during a blizzard to channel their collective energy into a single artifact, forging a powerful ring that bestowed upon the wielder mastery over all of the elements.

A [GetCraftsmanJobForEmployer] has arrived at the court and is waiting to hear your wishes on how to upgrade the [GetMarketArtifactName].

A [GetCraftsmanJobForEmployer] came to your royal court. However, this is not the person you assigned to upgrade [GetMarketArtifactName]. The half-naked [GetCraftsmanJobForEmployer] claims to have been robbed by the adventurer on the way here. The description of the adventurer reminds your trusted people of the [GetCraftsmanJobForEmployer]’s appearance, whom you have appointed to upgrade the [GetMarketArtifactName]...

You waited for a long time, but [GetCraftsmanJobForEmployer], whom you appointed to upgrade the [GetMarketArtifactName], did not come. From your trusted people, you hear that local populations are worried that a [GetCraftsmanJobForEmployer], carrying an [GetMarketArtifactName], was recently killed and looted by an adventurer.
In the process of upgrading the [GetMarketArtifactName], the [GetCraftsmanJobForEmployer] made a mistake and failed to upgrade it! Fortunately, he returned the artifact to its original state.

In the process of upgrading the [GetMarketArtifactName], the [GetCraftsmanJobForEmployer] made a terrible mistake that cannot be undone and failed to upgrade your [GetMarketArtifactName]! Now this [GetMarketArtifactName] cannot be upgraded!
A [GetCraftsmanJobForEmployer] worked hard and successfully upgraded your [GetMarketArtifactName].
A [GetCraftsmanJobForEmployer] who could make you a [GetMarketArtifactName] was found.
Your servant used your money to flee from your realm.

You waited for a long time, but the servant whom you sent to the market did not return. From your trusted people, you hear that the local community is worried that a certain person who bought a [GetMarketArtifactName] from a [GetCraftsmanJobForEmployer] was recently killed and looted by an adventurer.
